channel.title: Compiler code?
channel.description:
Hi i have no clue i just downloaded a new source :| and i compiled it said it didnt regizone java then i put the code for my other compiler and it said. Could one of you guys give me your codes?
[code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
[code]@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[/code]

item.title: Compiler code?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

That has nothing to do with environmental variables, there are no Java source files in the specified directory.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler code?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

You need to set your environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler code?
item.dc:creator: @co_pked co pked
item.description:
@co_pked wrote:

Hi i have no clue i just downloaded a new source and i compiled it said it didnt regizone java then i put the code for my other compiler and it said. Could one of you guys give me your codes?

javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
